summary: A collection of Django test cases that exercise form and model form functionality, checking handling of empty labels, default values (including callables), file uploads with Unicode names, many‑to‑many field exclusion, related model loading order, and lazy evaluation of model choice fields.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of form processing and model interactions in the application, ensuring edge‑case scenarios are covered and regressions are caught during development.
